message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $15,000. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counteroffer at $13,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this happen!
